sentence.Network_en: He gave an exclamation of surprise.
The author used three exclamation marks at the end of the last sentence to wake up the readers.
sentence.Network_cn: 作者在文章的最后一句连用了三个惊叹号,以引起读者的注意.

sentence.Network_en: For my part , I cannot keep from uttering an exclamation of surprise!
sentence.Network_cn: 我那时是惊奇地叫了一声的!

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin exclamatio(n-), from exclamare 'shout out' (see exclaim)

entry.tran: 惊叫;感叹;感叹词;感叹句
entry.def: An exclamation is a sound, word, or sentence that is spoken suddenly, loudly, or emphatically and that expresses excitement, admiration, shock, or anger.

example.ex: Sue gave an exclamation as we got a clear sight of the house.
example.tran: 我们清楚看到那所房子时，休惊叹不已。

means.word_mean: 2. a loud complaint or protest or reproach

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are, for example, numerous exclamation marks!

auth_sentence.content: Lucia suddenly gave a little exclamation of annoyance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lucia suddenly gave a little exclamation of annoyance.

auth_sentence.res_content: Some pathetic exclamation on the decadence of taste and genius.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿
acclaim[[v.欢呼;喝采]]→n.喝采,称赞
declaim[[v.朗诵;谴责]]→n.慷慨演说;雄辩
exclaim[[v.叫喊;大声说]]→n.叫喊;感叹
proclaim[[v.公布;声明]]省鷑.宣告;宣言
reclaim[[v.收回,开垦]]→n.收复;矫正
claim呼喊,叫喊→n.&v.要求;论断
ac一再+claim呼喊,叫喊→一再喊→欢呼
ex出+claim呼喊,叫喊→喊出→叫出
pro在前+claim呼喊,叫喊→在前面喊→公布
re回+claim呼喊,叫喊→喊回来→收回来,引申为开荒

sentences.en: The visitors broke into exclamations of wonder when they saw the magnificent Great Wall.
sentences.cn: 看到雄伟的长城, 游客们惊叹不已。
